description_text:
Hello. I have simsonn pro plus pedals. I would like to get heptics on them.
What do i need? VAM or VAM pro (can you tell me what is different on those
two?), brackets, power suply and pedal control box (which one? And can you
tell me do i plug pedals into that box together with motors?)?
Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Ante Višić,  If you have Pro pedals, you will also need a Plus X control unit (either VAM or VAM Pro) and a standalone 24V power supply. All of these come with motor brackets included.
